name: Dracula the Undead
description: Dracula - The Undead is a video game released in 1991 for the Atari Lynx handheld system. The game is loosely based on Bram Stoker's novel Dracula and features Bram Stoker in the story as the narrator. The player takes the role of Jonathan Harker as he tries to escape from Dracula's Castle.
